title: A review on recent advances of cellulose acetate membranes for gas separation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19560-19580
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01315H, Review Article

Zunara Bashir, Serene Sow Mun Lock, Noor e Hira, Suhaib Umer Ilyas, Lam Ghai Lim, Irene Sow Mei Lock, Chung Loong Yiin, Mehtab Ali Darban
This review thoroughly investigates the wide-ranging applications of cellulose-based materials, with a particular focus on their utility in gas separation processes.
